bioAsHtml: Alex has been with Terracotta for over 5 years, working on Ehcache, Quartz and the Terracotta platform in general. Prior to that, he was consulting with different companies helping them to deliver large scale applications. He's been part of the internal working group on JSR107 at Terracotta, an export on JSR347 and one of the representative for Software AG on the JCP Executive Committee. In his spare time he enjoys watching playing music, taking pictures and watching hockey... when not busy with his three kids! He runs Devoxx4kids in Quebec, where he also lives.
